channel.title: Sonic Writing
channel.description: A research blog for the AHRC funded Sonic Writing research project. This project explores how musical instrument design, musical notation techniques, and phonography is translated into current works in digital media.

item.title: This is a placeholder page for the first blog entry (a ha ha)
